channel.title: My Second Little Question!
channel.description:
[s]Does anyone know how to change the weapon attack speed for your hands on testscape? If you do please can you post a link or a code. Even a short tutorial may help.[/s]
Does anyone know how to make a person start with a weapon on testscape? Can you make it so they cannot unequip it? If you d please can you post a link or a code. Even a short tutorial can help.
Thankyou.
-[u][b]Slivion[/b][/u]

item.title: My Second Little Question!
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

That weapon delay thing works, but you must remember that those numbers are in milliseconds. 15ms=1,5 sec.

Read full topic

item.title: My Second Little Question!
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Thankyou. You can't try and help me on the first question aswell can you?

Does anyone know how to change the weapon attack speed for your hands on testscape?
If you do please can you post a link or a code.
Even a short tutorial may help.

Thankyou.

This is from top of my head, so post feedbacks…

Search…:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) // rune scimi here

you will see something like this…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) // rune scimi here { PkingDelay = 15; wepdelay = 15; }

Change the…

PkingDelay = 15; wepdelay = 15;

To the time you want for the wepeans, there is a huge list of weapons so choose that one most usefull…

and 15 is prefered, not to fast and not to slow =)

Credits: Dell / or if anyone has posted this before.

Read full topic
